title: -17 LP and 5 games ban WTF ?
body: i was in champ select then suddenly lol client closed and start updating , ok i waited then logged in and reconnected to the game at 8 min started farming to get back and we won .. then i got no XP no champ progress and lost 17 LP and got leaverbuster punishment  REALLY RIOT ? if you treat players like that why should we reconnect ? or why should we keep playing even ? .. i know that riot won't do any effort to think about these problems but i'm writing this while running 20 min ban in the background. peace {{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body: It sounds like you disconnected from the match and were gone long enough to get marked by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  It will treat the match as a loss and can apply a lower priority queue if you have had more than 1 leave.  If you've been having consistent disconnections, let me know and we can troubleshoot.

i suggest this modification for the LPQ system , if game is lost the leaver get 0 XP , -LP and 5 LPQ Games , if game is won the leaver get 0 XP , ( LP be kept as it was ) , and 5 LPQ Games , isn't it better ?
it happens everytime but all of a sudden it will start checking files from 5 gb to 0 mb while i'm browsing lol store and  collections etc . . ( ps it happens only in champ select )
